title: The Wind Your Voice, The Rain Your Tears
description: Small town mechanic Vinny Shields doesn't have much going for him. He has a girlfriend that seems to chase every man that crosses her path. His father and mother are consistently unimpressed with his lifestyle. And his younger brother just dropped a bombshell that will change the dynamic of his family.Vinny then meets the flamboyant gas station attendant, Tristan May, and learns more about what it means to love and be loved.
author: M.E. Sanford
